infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: PCM Connect  will use your photo to make you more recognizable to other users. Especially when you are trying to join a team.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: PCM Connect uses your location to find the closest groups to you. We do not track you or store your location in any way.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: PCM Connect uses your location to find the closest groups to you. We do not track you or store your location in any way.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: PCM Connect uses your location to find the closest groups to you. We do not track you or store your location in any way.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: PCM Connect  will use your photo to make you more recognizable to other users. Especially when you are trying to join a team.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: PCM Connect  will use your photo to make you more recognizable to other users. Especially when you are trying to join a team.
